progassign1

Class MST4D

  • java.lang.Object
    • progassign1.MST4D

  • public class MST4D
extends java.lang.Object
    The MST class represents a minimum spanning tree in four dimensions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MST4D(Vertex4D first) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addNode(Vertex4D v)
      The addNode method adds a vertex to the minimum spanning tree and ensures that a node already contained in the MST cannot be redundantly added to it.
      Vertex4D getBestNode()
      The getBestNode method returns the node within the MST that has the shortest edge attached to it.
      double getWeight()
      The getWeight method returns the total weight of the MST (sum of all the weights of the edges).
      int numVertices()
      The numVertices method returns the size of the MST (# of nodes).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MST4D

        public MST4D(Vertex4D first)

    • Method Detail

      • addNode

        public void addNode(Vertex4D v)
        The addNode method adds a vertex to the minimum spanning tree and ensures that a node already contained in the MST cannot be redundantly added to it. The method also determines the node with the shortest edge attached to it after the new node is added and sets it to the bestNode field.
        Parameters:
        v - The vertex to be added to the MST.

      • getBestNode

        public Vertex4D getBestNode()
        The getBestNode method returns the node within the MST that has the shortest edge attached to it.
        Returns:
        A node within the MST that has the shortest edge attached to it.

      • numVertices

        public int numVertices()
        The numVertices method returns the size of the MST (# of nodes).
        Returns:
        An integer representing the size of the MST.

      • getWeight

        public double getWeight()
        The getWeight method returns the total weight of the MST (sum of all the weights of the edges).
        Returns:
        The total weight of the MST.
